name: Quantum Formation
description:
Use your ships to switch between four formations to take down enemies as efficiently as possible in this retro-style 2D space shooter!

Created for the Fitchburg State Game Jam 2020.

Controls:

WASD to Move

SPACEBAR to Shoot

Q and E to Switch Ship/Formation

ESC to Quit Game

Credits:

  • Lead Programmer and Producer: Kevin Ward
  • UI Programmer: Anthony Gatturna
  • Level Design: Stephen Hunter Day
  • Artists: Pierre Padilla, Domenic Calitri
  • UI Artist: Max "eXimius" C.
